text: Katarína Šimoňáková (born 31 January 1998) is a Slovak luger. She competed in the women's singles event at the 2018 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:Slovak female lugers Category:Olympic lugers of Slovakia Category:Lugers at the 2018 Winter Olympics Category:People from Spišská Nová Ves Category:Competitors at the 2016 Winter Youth Olympics
title: Katarína Šimoňáková
